data.description: Intended for students who seek to transform their own ideas into new ventures.  Students will learn the process of evaluating, formalizing, and communicating a new venture idea.  Student originated product/service/venture concept required for course.
data.title: VENTURE CREATION

data.description: Students develop and present comprehensive business and financing plans for a start-up firm.  Investment recommendations are made to the WAVE Board.  Class meets in a seminar format with various subject matter experts.
data.title: WEINERT APPLIED VENTURES IN ENTREPRENEURSHIP (WAVE)
